dcterms:description: The CHiME4 dataset consists of speech data recorded in various noisy environments, designed to evaluate robust speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: CHiME4

dcterms:description: The AMI dataset is a meeting corpus that includes recordings of meetings with multiple speakers, designed for research in automatic speech recognition and meeting analysis.
dcterms:title: AMI
